location.zh-cn: 中国海南省琼海市博鳌镇

description.zh-cn: 一个由亚洲29个国家共同发起的非官方、非营利性、定期、定址的国际组织，为政府、企业及专家学者等提供一个共商经济、社会、环境及其他相关问题的高层对话平台。
description.en: A non-governmental, non-profit, regular, and fixed-location international organization jointly initiated by 29 Asian countries, providing a high-level dialogue platform for governments, businesses, and academics to discuss economic, social, environmental, and other related issues.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚前总理，博鳌亚洲论坛的倡议者之一。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Australia, one of the initiators of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 日本前首相，博鳌亚洲论坛的倡议者之一。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan, one of the initiators of the Boao Forum for Asia.

nodes.id: 菲德尔·瓦尔德斯·拉莫斯

zh-cn: 菲德尔·瓦尔德斯·拉莫斯

description.zh-cn: 菲律宾前总统，博鳌亚洲论坛的倡议者和首任理事长。
description.en: Former President of the Philippines, an initiator and the first Chairman of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国家领导人，参与了博鳌亚洲论坛的筹设并多次出席年会。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who was involved in the establishment of the Boao Forum for Asia and attended its annual conferences multiple times.

description.zh-cn: 在瑞士达沃斯举办的著名国际经济论坛，是博鳌亚洲论坛的参考模式。
description.en: A famous international economic forum held in Davos, Switzerland, which served as a model for the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前对外贸易经济合作部副部长，博鳌亚洲论坛第一届秘书长。
description.en: Former Vice Minister of Foreign Trade and Economic Cooperation of the People's Republic of China, and the first Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 韩国前外交通商部部长、前联合国秘书长，博鳌亚洲论坛第三届理事长。
description.en: Former Minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade of South Korea and former Secretary-General of the United Nations, and the third Chairman of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 博鳌亚洲论坛的创始国及总部所在地。
description.en: A founding country and the host country of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 博鳌亚洲论坛的倡议国和发起国之一。
description.en: An initiating and founding country of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 导致博鳌亚洲论坛2020年年会延期后最终停办的全球性传染病疫情。
description.en: A global pandemic that led to the postponement and eventual cancellation of the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2020.

nodes.id: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

zh-cn: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 一个由中国倡议设立的多边开发银行，其成立在博鳌亚洲论坛2014年年会上得到推动。
description.en: A multilateral development bank initiated by China, whose establishment was promoted at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2014.

description.zh-cn: 中国提出的跨国经济发展倡议，其建设的愿景与行动文件在博鳌亚洲论坛2015年年会上发布。
description.en: A transnational economic development initiative proposed by China, whose vision and action document was released at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2015.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国前副总统，以商界身份（两岸共同市场基金会董事长）出席博鳌亚洲论坛2008年年会，并与时任中共中央总书记胡锦涛会面。
description.en: Former Vice President of the Republic of China, who attended the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2008 in his business capacity (as Chairman of the Cross-Strait Common Market Foundation) and met with then-CPC General Secretary Hu Jintao.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国家领导人，特邀出席了博鳌亚洲论坛成立大会。
description.en: Former paramount leader of the People's Republic of China, who was specially invited to attend the inaugural conference of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中共中央总书记、中华人民共和国主席，曾多次出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会并发表主旨演讲。
description.en: General Secretary of the CPC Central Committee and President of the People's Republic of China, who has attended the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference multiple times and delivered keynote speeches.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前国务院总理，曾多次出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会并发表主题演讲。
description.en: Former Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who attended the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference multiple times and delivered keynote speeches.

description.zh-cn: 日本前内阁总理大臣，博鳌亚洲论坛第二届理事长。
description.en: Former Prime Minister of Japan and the second Chairman of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前外交部副部长、前驻美国大使，博鳌亚洲论坛第二届秘书长。
description.en: Former Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China and former Ambassador to the United States, and the second Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前外交部副部长、前常驻联合国代表，博鳌亚洲论坛第三届秘书长。
description.en: Former Vice Minister of Foreign Affairs of the People's Republic of China and former Permanent Representative to the United Nations, and the third Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国前常驻联合国代表，博鳌亚洲论坛第四届秘书长。
description.en: Former Permanent Representative of the People's Republic of China to the United Nations, and the fourth Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 博鳌亚洲论坛副理事长。
description.en: Vice Chairman of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 新加坡总理，曾出席博鳌亚洲论坛年会。
description.en: Prime Minister of Singapore, who has attended the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院总理，出席了博鳌亚洲论坛2023年年会开幕式并致辞。
description.en: Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, who attended the opening ceremony of the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2023 and delivered a speech.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月，与细川护熙、拉莫斯共同倡议成立一个类似“世界经济论坛”的“亚洲论坛”。
description.en: In September 1998, along with Morihiro Hosokawa and Fidel Ramos, proposed the establishment of an 'Asian Forum' similar to the 'World Economic Forum'.

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月，与霍克、拉莫斯共同倡议成立一个类似“世界经济论坛”的“亚洲论坛”。
description.en: In September 1998, along with Bob Hawke and Fidel Ramos, proposed the establishment of an 'Asian Forum' similar to the 'World Economic Forum'.

relationships.source: 菲德尔·瓦尔德斯·拉莫斯

description.zh-cn: 1998年9月，与霍克、细川护熙共同倡议成立一个类似“世界经济论坛”的“亚洲论坛”。
description.en: In September 1998, along with Bob Hawke and Morihiro Hosokawa, proposed the establishment of an 'Asian Forum' similar to the 'World Economic Forum'.

description.zh-cn: 与拉莫斯和霍克在北京议定亚洲论坛的筹设。
description.en: Agreed upon the establishment plan for the Asian Forum with Ramos and Hawke in Beijing.

description.zh-cn: 博鳌亚洲论坛是参照达沃斯世界经济论坛的模式而成立的。
description.en: The Boao Forum for Asia was established based on the model of the World Economic Forum in Davos.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国是博鳌亚洲论坛的26个创始国之一。
description.en: The People's Republic of China is one of the 26 founding countries of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 澳大利亚是博鳌亚洲论坛的26个创始国之一。
description.en: Australia is one of the 26 founding countries of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第一届秘书长。
description.en: Served as the first Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.en: Served as the first Chairman of the Board of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第二届秘书长。
description.en: Served as the second Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第二届理事长。
description.en: Served as the second Chairman of the Board of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第三届秘书长。
description.en: Served as the third Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第三届理事长。
description.en: Served as the third Chairman of the Board of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 担任博鳌亚洲论坛第四届秘书长。
description.en: Serving as the fourth Secretary-General of the Boao Forum for Asia.

description.zh-cn: 在博鳌亚洲论坛2008年年会上会面，成为两岸关系史上高层级的非正式官方会谈。
description.en: Met at the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2008, which became a high-level unofficial official meeting in the history of cross-strait relations.

description.zh-cn: 受疫情影响，博鳌亚洲论坛2020年年会于4月30日宣布停办。
description.en: Due to the pandemic, the cancellation of the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2020 was announced on April 30, 2020.

relationships.target: 亚洲基础设施投资银行

description.zh-cn: 在博鳌亚洲论坛2014年年会上，时任中国国务院总理李克强指出中方正争取早日正式成立亚洲基础设施投资银行。
description.en: At the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2014, then-Chinese Premier Li Keqiang stated that China was striving for the early official establishment of the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank.

description.zh-cn: 在博鳌亚洲论坛2015年年会期间，中国国务院授权发布了《推动共建丝绸之路经济带和21世纪海上丝绸之路的愿景与行动》文件。
description.en: During the Boao Forum for Asia Annual Conference 2015, the State Council of China authorized the release of the document 'Vision and Actions on Jointly Building Silk Road Economic Belt and 21st-Century Maritime Silk Road'.
